title: A theological discourse of the gracious and blessed coniunction of Christ and a sincere Christian. By Tho: Tuke Preacher of Gods word. The blessed virgin Mary brought foorth Christ, and the Catholique Church brings foorth all true Christians
author: Tuke, Thomas, d. 1657.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by Edw: Griffin dwelling in the little Old-baily neere the signe of the Kings head,
